name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
synopsis: Unleash the razor sharp adamantium claws, feral instincts and mutant regeneration powers of the world's fiercest superhero in X-Men Origins: Wolverine. Uncage the story of how the ultimate weapon was created. The team at Raven Software has dedicated Wolverine's development to unstoppable, true-to-character authenticity. Take on impossible odds and exact vicious revenge in the year's most satisfying action game.
